lib.CasseroleHourmeter

Class CasseroleHourmeter

  • java.lang.Object
    • lib.CasseroleHourmeter.CasseroleHourmeter

  • public class CasseroleHourmeter
extends java.lang.Object
    DESCRIPTION:
    Tracks robot runtime over its life. Records data in a special file on the RIO's filesystem. Data is useful for determining how long various parts last, or just seeing how much time you've run your robot for.

    USAGE:
    1. Instantiate Class. Hourmeter starts in the background.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.lang.String HOURMETER_FNAME
      Location where the hourmeter data will be stored
      boolean isRunning
      True when the hourmeter is running, false if it has stopped for any reason
      double minutesAutonomous
      Total minutes the robot has been running in autonomous mode.
      double minutesDisabled
      Total minutes the robot has been running in disabled mode.
      double minutesTeleop
      Total minutes the robot has been running in teleop mode.
      double minutesTest
      Total minutes the robot has been running in test mode.
      double minutesTotal
      Total minutes the robot has had user software running
      double numAutonomousEnables
      Number of times the robot has been enabled into autonomous mode
      double numTeleopEnables
      Number of times the robot has been enabled into teleop mode
      double numTestEnables
      Number of times the robot has been enabled into test mode

    • Method Detail

      • immedeateUpdate

        public void immedeateUpdate()
        Perform an immediate update of the hourmeter. This does add some overhead so use it sparingly. However, it's good to use in any of the *_init methods to be sure the file is properly updated.
